title: flex-basis
desc: Defines the initial size of a flexbox item.

title: flex-shrink
desc: Defines how much a flexbox item should shrink if there's not enough space available.

title: flex-direction
desc: Defines how flexbox items are ordered within a flexbox container.

title: flex-wrap
desc: Defines if flexbox items appear on a single line or on multiple lines within a flexbox container.

title: flex-flow
desc: Shorthand property for flex-direction  and  flex-wrap.

title: flex-grow
desc: Defines how much a flexbox item should grow if there's space available.
